hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Sun on Floor Room

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Have you embraced the power of the Deku Nut yet?

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Game Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

GC (Maze).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Game Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Shadow Temple#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #5# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #0# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #time#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kakariko Village# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: If you see something suspicious, bomb it!

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #2# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Double Eye Switch Room Pot 2

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Treasure Box Shop#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Fire Keese Pot

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Stray Fairy# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Forest Temple#.
